verses.verse: Moreover thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> with ten <S%H6235><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, and blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%>: with cherubims <S%H3742><s%> of cunning <S%H2803><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> them. of cunning: Heb. the work of a cunning workman, or, embroiderer

The length <S%H753><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> shall be eight <S%H8083><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>: and every one of the curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall have one <S%H259><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%>.

The five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall be coupled together <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H802><s%> to another <S%H269><s%>; and other five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall be coupled <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H802><s%> to another <S%H269><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%> upon the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> from the selvedge <S%H7098><s%> in the coupling <S%H2279><s%>; and likewise shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> in the uttermost <S%H7020><s%> edge <S%H8193><s%> of another curtain <S%H3407><s%>, in the coupling <S%H4225><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%>.

Fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> in the one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%>, and fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is in the coupling <S%H4225><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%>; that the loops <S%H3924><s%> may take hold <S%H6901><s%> one <S%H802><s%> of another <S%H269><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> taches <S%H7165><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and couple <S%H2266><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> together with <S%H802><s%> <S%H269><s%> the taches <S%H7165><s%>: and it shall be one <S%H259><s%> tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> of goats' <S%H5795><s%> hair to be a covering <S%H168><s%> upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>: eleven <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%>.

The length <S%H753><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> shall be thirty <S%H7970><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>: and the eleven <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall be all of one <S%H259><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%>.

And thou shalt couple <S%H2266><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves, and six <S%H8337><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves, and shalt double <S%H3717><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> in the forefront <S%H4136><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is outmost <S%H7020><s%> in the coupling <S%H2279><s%>, and fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> in the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> which coupleth <S%H2279><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> taches <S%H7165><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, and put <S%H935><s%> the taches <S%H7165><s%> into the loops <S%H3924><s%>, and couple <S%H2266><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> together, that it may be one <S%H259><s%>. tent: or, covering

And the remnant <S%H5629><s%> that remaineth <S%H5736><s%> of the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%>, the half <S%H2677><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> that remaineth <S%H5736><s%>, shall hang <S%H5628><s%> over the backside <S%H268><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And a cubit <S%H520><s%> on the one side <S%H2088><s%>, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> on the other side of that which remaineth <S%H5736><s%> in the length <S%H753><s%> of the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%>, it shall hang <S%H5628><s%> over the sides <S%H6654><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> on this side and on that side, to cover <S%H3680><s%> it. of that: Heb. in the remainder, or, surplus

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> a covering <S%H4372><s%> for the tent <S%H168><s%> of rams' <S%H352><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red <S%H119><s%>, and a covering <S%H4372><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%>.
And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> standing up <S%H5975><s%>.

Ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> of a board <S%H7175><s%>, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> shall be the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>.

Two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%> shall there be in one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>, set in order <S%H7947><s%> one <S%H802><s%> against another <S%H269><s%>: thus shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> for all the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>. tenons: Heb. hands

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H8486><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> under the twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for his two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under another <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for his two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%>.
And for the second <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> there shall be twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%>:

And their forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under another <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>.
And for the sides <S%H3411><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%>.
And two <S%H8147><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> for the corners <S%H4742><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> in the two sides <S%H3411><s%>.

And they shall be coupled <S%H8382><s%> together beneath <S%H4295><s%>, and they shall be coupled <S%H8382><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> above the head <S%H7218><s%> of it unto one <S%H259><s%> ring <S%H2885><s%>: thus shall it be for them both <S%H8147><s%>; they shall be for the two <S%H8147><s%> corners <S%H4740><s%>. coupled: Heb. twinned

And they shall be eight <S%H8083><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%>; two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under another <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>; five <S%H2568><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>,

And five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, for the two sides <S%H3411><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>.
And the middle <S%H8484><s%> bar <S%H1280><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the boards <S%H7175><s%> shall reach <S%H1272><s%> from end <S%H7097><s%> to end <S%H7097><s%>.

And thou shalt overlay <S%H6823><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> their rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for places <S%H1004><s%> for the bars <S%H1280><s%>: and thou shalt overlay <S%H6823><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>.
And thou shalt rear up <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> according to the fashion <S%H4941><s%> thereof which was shewed <S%H7200><s%> thee in the mount <S%H2022><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> a vail <S%H6532><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%> of cunning <S%H2803><s%> work <S%H4639><s%>: with cherubims <S%H3742><s%> shall it be made <S%H6213><s%>:

And thou shalt hang <S%H5414><s%> it upon four <S%H702><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood overlaid <S%H6823><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%>: their hooks <S%H2053><s%> shall be of gold <S%H2091><s%>, upon the four <S%H702><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>.

And thou shalt hang up <S%H5414><s%> the vail <S%H6532><s%> under the taches <S%H7165><s%>, that thou mayest bring <S%H935><s%> in thither within <S%H1004><s%> the vail <S%H6532><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>: and the vail <S%H6532><s%> shall divide <S%H914><s%> unto you between the holy <S%H6944><s%> place and the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.
And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> upon the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place.

And thou shalt set <S%H7760><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the vail <S%H6532><s%>, and the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> over against <S%H5227><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> on the side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> toward the south <S%H8486><s%>: and thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6763><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> an hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%>, of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, wrought <S%H4639><s%> with needlework <S%H7551><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> for the hanging <S%H4539><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>, and their hooks <S%H2053><s%> shall be of gold <S%H2091><s%>: and thou shalt cast <S%H3332><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> for them.
